snippet: Fox will replace episodes of two animated series, "Family Guy" and "American Dad," set to be shown on Sunday night. Syfy did not broadcast an episode of "Haven" on Friday night because of scenes involving violence in a school.
abstract: Fox will replace episodes of two animated series, "Family Guy" and "American Dad," set to be shown on Sunday night. Syfy did not broadcast an episode of "Haven" on Friday night because of scenes involving violence in a school.

headline.main: Fox and Syfy Alter Episodes in Light of School Massacre
